starters.title: Start here
starters.description: Set out on your journey by building your first website followed by building fun, exciting things with this collection of endlessly-expandable mini-workshops.

javascript.title: JavaScript
javascript.description: Learn how to build cool things on the web!

react.title: React
react.description: Learn to use one of the most popular JavaScript frameworks on the web.

rails.title: Ruby on Rails
rails.description: Learn to easily build complex web apps with Rails.

ml.title: Machine Learning
ml.description: Learn how to make machines learn with these fun projects!

arduino.title: Arduino
arduino.description: Bring projects from cyberspace to the real world with this small hardware platform.

misc.title: Miscellaneous
misc.description: The odd ones out. Workshops that don't quite fit into any category.
